name: GeoIT Developer
about_original: My Portfolio Website
about: My Portfolio Website
description: GeoIT Developer is a portfolio website showcasing the skills and projects by Alf-Anas. Built using ReactJS, NextJS, and enhanced with Tailwind CSS and Ant Design for a sleek and responsive user interface. The project is mainly about merging geography and technology.
tech_stack: ReactJS, NextJS, Tailwind CSS, Ant Design, JavaScript, TypeScript, HTML, CSS

name: SIASN Instansi
about_original: Application for data integration of ASN (civil servant) in Indonesia. This is an internal app for ASN only.
about: Application for data integration of ASN (civil servant) in Indonesia. This is an internal app for ASN only.
description: SIASN Instansi is an internal application designed for the integration of civil servant data in Indonesia. Developed by Badan Kepegawaian Negara (BKN), the app utilizes ReactJS, NextJS, and a tech stack including Ant Design and Redux for efficient data management.
tech_stack: ReactJS, NextJS, Ant Design, Bootstrap, Redux, KeyCloak, TypeScript, JavaScript, HTML, CSS

name: TenderEase
about_original: The all-in-one solution for managing, creating, and finding tenders
about: The all-in-one solution for managing, creating, and finding tenders
description: TenderEase is the ultimate solution for managing, creating, and discovering tenders. Developed in collaboration with Kolibri for Impact, the web platform is powered by ReactJS, NextJS, GraphQL, and a robust tech stack including Material UI and TypeScript for seamless tender management.
tech_stack: ReactJS, NextJS, GraphQL, Refine, Material UI, Zustand, TypeScript, JavaScript, HTML, CSS

name: Electoral Redistricting App
about_original: Boundary Delimitation Tool is a tool to draw electoral district boundaries and to assist in the electoral delineation process. This app is a cooperation between Perludem and QGIS Indonesia.
about: Boundary Delimitation Tool is a tool to draw electoral district boundaries and assist in the electoral delineation process. This app is a cooperation between Perludem and QGIS Indonesia.
description: Electoral Redistricting App, also known as the Boundary Delimitation Tool, is a collaborative effort between Perludem, International IDEA, and QGIS User Group Indonesia. This cross-platform application, available on both the web and Windows, leverages ReactJS, NextJS, and a diverse tech stack, including OpenLayers and ElectronJS, to facilitate the electoral district boundary drawing and delineation process.
tech_stack: ReactJS, NextJS, Tailwind CSS, OpenLayers, LeafletJS, TurfJS, ElectronJS, JavaScript, HTML, CSS, PHP, MySQL

name: Jaga Suara
about_original: Application for election vote analysis in Indonesia. By collecting data of previous election, we can analyst the data for strategizing in future election.
about: Application for election vote analysis in Indonesia. By collecting data from the previous election, we can analyze the data for strategizing in future elections.
description: Jaga Suara is a versatile application designed for election vote analysis in Indonesia. Compatible with various platforms including Web, PWA, TWA, and Android, the app utilizes ReactJS and Material UI along with advanced mapping technologies such as Mapbox GL JS and TurfJS. Data collection and analysis from previous elections empower strategic planning for future electoral campaigns.
tech_stack: ReactJS, Material UI, Mapbox GL JS, TurfJS, JavaScript, HTML, CSS, Bubblewrap, IndexedDB, PHP

name: Batas Administrasi Indonesia
about_original: An app for downloading administration boundary in Indonesia from Province level to village level.
about: An app for downloading administrative boundaries in Indonesia from the province level to the village level.
description: Batas Administrasi Indonesia is a web application designed for downloading administrative boundaries in Indonesia, ranging from the province level to the village level. Developed using ReactJS, NextJS, and a tech stack including Ant Design and MapLibre, the app ensures a user-friendly experience for accessing and managing administrative boundary data.
tech_stack: ReactJS, NextJS, Ant Design, Tailwind CSS, MapLibre, TurfJS, JavaScript, TypeScript, HTML, CSS, SQLite, PHP

name: Fusion Flow V2

name: Image EXIF to CSV
about_original:
A simple web app to convert or extract metadata from photo/image files, and save it as .csv files.
You can convert/get image files GPS Corrdinate (latitude, longitude) from image metadata/properties, and save it as csv files.
about: A simple web app to convert or extract metadata from photo/image files and save it as .csv files. You can convert/get image files GPS Coordinate (latitude, longitude) from image metadata/properties and save it as CSV files.
description: Image EXIF to CSV is a simple web app developed by PT. Surveyor Indonesia for converting or extracting metadata from photo/image files and saving it as .csv files. The app supports the extraction of GPS coordinates (latitude, longitude) from image metadata/properties, providing a user-friendly interface and leveraging technologies such as ReactJS, Chakra UI, JavaScript, HTML, and CSS for efficient conversion and data management.
tech_stack: ReactJS, Chakra UI, JavaScript, HTML, CSS

tech_stack: Flarum, Amazon S3
